Portfolio: Simon Heimler

Full-Stack Web Developer, specializing in Data, Knowledge, Visualisation & Automation.

About me

Hi! I'm a software engineer (M.Sc.) from Regensburg, Germany, doing full-stack-web-development since around 2001, professionally since 2007.

At the moment, I'm most experienced in modern JavaScript programming, both on the frontend and backend (Node.js). But I'm a generalist at heart and love to constantly learn about new technologies and concepts, building and inventing innovative solutions!

Example Projects

mobo

mobo is a CLI toolset that generates Semantic MediaWiki structure in an agile, model/schema driven way. It can be used for both rapid-prototyping and automated deployment of information management systems.

  • JavaScript. Node.js CLI Application. NPM Package
  • www.github.com/Fannon/mobo
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2014

plastic.js

plastic.js makes data aggregation, transforming and visualization easier by integrating it to a coherent framework. To use it, no JavaScript skills are needed, as the HTML markup is the API.

  • JavaScript Framework
  • www.plasticjs.org
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2014

isomatic

Isomatic is anonline tool to generate isotype graphics in the browser. The user can copy and paste the data and adjust several options. The result can be exported (and reimported) to SVG.

(IIID Award 2014 Student Award – for "isomatic.de")

  • HTML5/JavaScript App. Using Backbone.js, D3.js, Zurb Foundation, etc.
  • My part was programming the visualisation, layouting algorithm and the User-Interface. We were an interdisciplinary team of three students.
  • www.isomatic.de
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2013/2014

Obacht Game

Obacht is a cross plattform multiplayer game for mobile devices and webbrowsers. It was available on the Apple Store and Google Play Store, but is now discontinued.

  • HTML5/JavaScript Game. Using Lime.js as Game-Engine and Node.js as Multiplayer-Server
  • My part was programming the Multiplayer-Server and the code architecture in general.
  • www.facebook.com/obachtgame
  • YouTube Promo Video
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2013

SAE

Quick Prototype. SAE visualizes social (graph) structures in specific research areas and conferences.

  • HTML5/JavaScript App. Using Sigma.js and Gephi.
  • www.fannon.de/p/sae/
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2013

SVG Generator

This is an online Tool that helps you create random SVG Images in many ways. The result can be exported to SVG Vector Graphic Files

  • JavaScript App. Using Raphael.js SVG Library
  • www.svg-generator.de
  • GitHub Open Source
  • 2011
